alert.note: Alert for Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms developing over portions of southern Brevard County through 615 PM EDT... At 529 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking rapidly developing strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Rockledge to 6 miles southwest of Camp Holly Fish Camp. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Bay, Melbourne, Rockledge, Cocoa Beach, and Satellite Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands
